## filterAsync() function

Filters the values in an array asynchronously.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function filterAsync<T>(// tslint:disable-line:export-name
array: T[], callback: (value: T, index: number, array: T[]) => Promise<boolean>): Promise<T[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>T[]</code> | the array to filter |
|  callback | <code>(value: T, index: number, array: T[]) =&gt; Promise&lt;boolean&gt;</code> | the asynchronous filter function |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<T[]>`

the filtered array
